map.name: Build: Parkour
map.objective: Build your own parkour then race everyone else!

rules.rule: You are allowed to skip a parkour after 2 minutes if it is too difficult
You cannot skip your own parkour
Parkours that can only be completed once are not allowed
Senior staff can expand team sizes infinitely if desired
Skipping can be disabled by holding gunpowder

broadcasts.alert: `aBuild a parkour course from `2start `ato `4end`a!
broadcasts.tip: `bDouble tap space to fly to assist you while building!
`bYou will have to beat your own parkour later, so don't make it too hard!
`bReturn to the `2START `bgate to restock on building materials!
broadcasts.alert: `aComplete your parkour for it to included in the race!
`aThe parkour race has begun!
broadcasts.tip: `bHaving trouble with a parkour? After `a2 minutes `byou will receive a skip token!
`bTo skip a parkour, hold your '`5Skip Current Parkour`b' star, then fall into the black net!

`aSkip this parkour arena by holding the Nether Star and jumping into the black net!
